page.title: 05EVENTS IN LLANGYNIDR
page.content: THE CHURCH FETE: THE CHURCH FETE IS A FETE HELD IN THE OLD RECTORY EVERY YEAR. IT IS A GATHERING OF DIFFERENT STALLS LIKE HOOLA HOOP, BOOKSTALL, BATHROOM STALL, KNOCKING THE CANS OFF A SHELF WITH THREE BALLS, ICE CREAM, RAFFLE, BOTTLE STALL AND TEAS AND CAKES. THE OPERA: EVERY YEAR THE LLANGYNIDR OPERA GROUP PUTS ON AN OPERA IN THE VILLAGE HALL. LAST YEAR'S PERFORMANCE WAS LA PERICOLLE. IN IT THE LLANGYNIDR JUNIOR OPERA GROUP DID A CIRCUS. THIS YEAR'S OPERA IS CALLED A KING FOR A DAY. IT IS THE FIRST TIME IT HAS BEEN SHOWN IN WALES. THE CHRISTMAS BAZAAR: THIS TAKES PLACE IN SCHOOL EVERY CHRISTMAS. THERE ARE VARIOUS STALLS. THERE IS ALSO A ROOM WITH COMPUTERS AND YOU PAY TO PLAY ON THEM. ONCE EVERYTHING HAS BEEN BOUGHT ON THE STALLS THERE IS A RAFFLE.
